Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Impressive Performance: Can use Performance to Make An Impression
Know-It-All: Successful Recall Knowledge checks give additional information
Melodious Spell: (1) Successful Performance vs. Perception hides subsequent spellcasting from observers
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict flat-footed/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on a chosen Performance type

Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; O6: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Occult: +20 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Occult: 30 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (O3 Foc Enc): (1) 5' emanation (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases the radius by 5')
Abundant Step (O4 Foc Con): (1) Teleports self 25' within line of sight
Abyssal Plague (O5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 Abyssal plague, which inflicts unrecoverable drained 1 until cured; subsequent failures after 1 day will inflict drained 2 at stage 2 (save Fortitude inflicts 2 HP evil per spell level and -2 saves vs. Abyssal plague for 1 day; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2)
Alarm (O1 Abj): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Allegro (OC7 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Target may take an additional Strike, Stride, or Step for 1 rd
Alter Reality (O10 Div): (3) Acts as Wish to reverse effects or produces effects similar to a known occult spell of up to 9th level or a common spell of up to 7th level
Antimagic Field (O8 Abj): (3) 10' emanation disables spells and magic items while sustained for up to 1 min
Augury (O2 Div): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Bane (O1 Enc): (2) 5' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min (save Will negates); a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 5'
Banishment (O5 Abj): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Soul (O9 Nec): (2) R30' Traps the soul of a corpse dead for less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or the gem is destroyed
Bind Undead (O3 Nec): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Black Tentacles (O5 Con): (3) R120' Successful spell attacks vs. Fortitude DC in a 20' burst inflict 3d6 HP bludgeoning and grabbed for 1 min, plus 1d6 HP bludgeoning each rd on grabbed creatures; escaping requires success vs. a DC 30 on an unarmed attack or inflicting 12 HP vs. Armor Class 30
Bless (O1 Enc): (2) 5' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 5'
Blindness (O3 Nec): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blink (O4 Con): (2) Self gains resistance 5 to non-force damage and can use Sustain to randomly teleport 10' for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +3 resistance)
Blur (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes concealed for 1 min
Calm Emotions (O2 Enc): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile action ends the spell for the target (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows the effects to continue after a hostile action)
Charm (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Chill Touch (OC1 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 1d4+4 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) or flat-footed on an undead for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure also inflicts fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP on living)
Chromatic Wall (O5 Abj): (3) R120' 60'x30' wall shines 20' light and inflicts randomly-chosen effects on passing objects and creatures for 10 min: (1) destroys ammunition and inflicts 20 HP fire on creatures (save basic Reflex; Cone Of Cold counteracts); (2) destroys thrown weapons and inflicts 25 HP acid on creatures (save basic Reflex; Gust Of Wind counteracts); (3) negates energy effects and inflicts 30 HP electricity on creatures (save basic Reflex; Disintegrate counteracts); (4) blocks gasses and inflicts 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min on creatures (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled; Passwall counteracts) (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr, inflicts +10 HP, and adds more effects possibilities: (5) negates petrification, sonic, and visual effects and inflicts Flesh To Stone on creatures (Magic Missile counteracts); (6) negates divination and mental effects and inflicts Warp Mind on creatures (Searing Light counteracts); (7) negates targeted spells and inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min on creatures (save Will negates; critical failure teleports to another plane; Dispel Magic counteracts); (8) effects as another option, but with -2 saves)
Circle Of Protection (O3 Abj): (3) 10' emanation around touched gives +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of a specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and on effects that control touched, for 1 min (heightened 4th effects last for 1 hr)
Clairaudience (O3 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to listen from the target location for 10 min
Clairvoyance (O4 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 10 min
Cloak Of Colors (O5 Ill): (2) R30' Creatures adjacent to the target suffer dazzled, and successful attackers suffer blinded for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd), for 1 min
Collective Transposition (O6 Con): (2) Teleports 2 targets within a 30' radius (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to control the teleport) (heightened +1 affects +1 target)
Color Spray (O1 Ill): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Command (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Comprehend Language (O2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Confusion (O4 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 min or until a successful save (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows no further save attempts) (heightened 8th affects 10 targets)
Continual Flame (O2 Evo): (3) Touched object emits a heatless flame until dismissed
Counter Performance (O1 Foc Enc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Crushing Despair (O5 Enc): (2) 30' cone prevents reactions, and failure on a second save inflicts slowed 1, for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min with no second save) (heightened 7th affects a 60' cone)
Dancing Lights (OC1 Evo): (2) R120' Creates 4 floating torch lights in a 10' radius that can be moved 60' each rd while sustained
Darkness (O2 Evo): (3) R120' 20' burst suppresses natural light and magical light of equal or lesser level for 1 min (heightened 4th conceals targets within the darkness from creatures with darkvision)
Darkvision (O2 Div): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (OC1 Enc): (2) R60' Inflicts 4 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (O2 Nec): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Death Knell (O2 Nec): (2) Kills a touched target with 0 HP and gives self 10 temporary HP and +1 attack and damage for 10 min (save Will increases the target's dying value by 1; critical success negates)
Death Ward (O5 Abj): (2) Touched gains +4 saves vs. death and negative effects, negative resistance 10, and suppressed doomed effects for 10 min
Detect Alignment (O1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals auras of a specified alignment (heightened 2nd reveals each aura's location and strength)
Detect Magic (OC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Scrying (O4 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals scrying effects, along with the scrying creature for lower-level effects, for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Dimension Door (O4 Con): (2) Teleports self to a visible location within 120' (heightened 5th allows teleporting to a familiar location within 1 mile)
Dimensional Anchor (O4 Abj): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Dimensional Lock (O7 Abj): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Dirge Of Doom (OC3 Foc Enc): (1) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes for 1 rd
Disappearance (O8 Ill): (2) Touched becomes undetectable by any sense for 10 min
Discern Lies (O4 Div): (2) Self gains +4 Perception vs. lies for 10 min
Discern Location (O8 Div): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object
Dispel Magic (O2 Abj): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dominate (O6 Enc): (2) R30' Self controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends the spell (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dream Council (O8 Ill): (10 min) Allows 12 known targets to communicate through a shared dream for 1 hr
Dream Message (O3 Enc): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Dreaming Potential (O5 Enc): (10 min) Touched receives a day of downtime retraining during 8 hr sleep
Duplicate Foe (O7 Con): (3) R30' Creates a minion copy of a target up to level 15 with 70 HP and no special abilities while sustained for up to 1 min or until reduced to 0 HP; the copy loses 4d6 HP after each turn (save Fortitude the copy inflicts half HP and lasts 2 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 increases the target level that can be copied by 2 and the copy HP by 10)
Empty Body (O9 Foc Con): (2) Moves self to the Ethereal Plane for 1 min
Energy Aegis (O7 Abj): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, negative, positive, and sonic damage for 1 day (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enthrall (O3 Enc): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained, with additional saves for disagreement (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure allows no further saves)
Ethereal Jaunt (O7 Con): (2) Moves self from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 9th R30' affects 5 additional willing creatures, and effects last for 10 min)
Fabricated Truth (O10 Enc): (3) R100' 5 targets believe a specified statement for 1 week (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects are permanent)
Faerie Fire (O2 Evo): (2) R120' 10' burst makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 5 min
False Life (O2 Nec): (2) Self gains 10 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
False Vision (O5 Ill): (10 min) Controls the image shown by scrying within a 100' burst until next daily prep
Fatal Aria (O10 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Kills a target up to level 16 or 50 HP, inflicts 0 HP and dying 1 on a level 17 target, or inflicts 50 HP on a level 18+ target
Fear (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Feeblemind (O6 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 4 until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent animal intelligence and -5 Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers and changes a PC into an NPC)
Floating Disk (O1 Con): (2) Creates an invisible 2' radius disk that follows self and holds 5 Bulk for 8 hr
Fly (O4 Tra): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)

Foresight (O9 Div): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer flat-footed vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a reaction to give the target the better of 2 rolls or its foe the worse of 2 rolls, for 1 hr
Gaseous Form (O4 Tra): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or self ends the spell
Gate (O10 Con): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gentle Repose (O2 Nec): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Ghost Sound (OC1 Ill): (2) R30' Creates sound equivalent to 4 humans shouting while sustained (heightened 3rd R60'; 5th R120')
Ghostly Weapon (O3 Tra): (2) Touched weapon becomes translucent and can affect incorporeal creatures for 5 min
Ghoulish Cravings (O2 Nec): (2) Touched suffers stage 2 ghoul fever, which inflicts 3d8 HP negative and half normal healing; subsequent daily save failures will inflict an additional 3d8 HP at stage 3, 3d8 HP and no healing at stage 4 and stage 5, and death and transformation into a ghoul at stage 6 (save Fortitude inflicts stage 1 with no initial ill effects; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 3)
Glibness (O4 Enc): (2) Self gains +16 Deception to lie and against Perception to discern truth for 10 min
Globe Of Invulnerability (O4 Abj): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Glyph Of Warding (O3 Abj): (10 min) Specified trigger on a target container or 10'x10' area triggers a chosen spell of lower level
Grim Tendrils (O1 Nec): (2) 30' line inflicts 2d4 HP negative and 1 HP persistent bleed on living creatures (save Fortitude inflicts half HP negative only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Guidance (OC1 Div): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Hallucination (O5 Ill): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of an object or group for 1 hr (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets or effects last until next daily prep; 8th affects any number of targets or effects are permanent)
Hallucinatory Terrain (O4 Ill): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Haste (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Heroism (O3 Enc): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Hideous Laughter (O2 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of reactions)
Horrific Visage (O3 Foc Ill): (2) 30' radius inflicts frightened 1 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 2) (heightened 5th inflicts frightened 1, 2, or 3 and fleeing for 1 rd on save success, failure, or critical failure)
House Of Imaginary Walls (OC5 Foc Ill): (1) Creates an adjacent invisible, illusionary, 10'x10' wall with Armor Class 10, double the spell level Hardness, and quadruple the spell level HP, for 1 rd
Humanoid Form (O2 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hypercognition (O3 Div): (1) Allows self to use 6 Recall Knowledge actions immediately
Hypnotic Pattern (O3 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of reactions)
Illusory Creature (O2 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a Large or smaller creature with Armor Class 30, +20 attack, 1d4+4 HP nonlethal mental damage, and +20 saves while sustained or until damaged; each Sustain allows directing 2 actions (heightened +1 creature inflicts +1d4 HP and can be 1 size larger)
Illusory Disguise (O1 Ill): (2) Makes self appear different and gives +16 Deception to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 2nd also disguises voice and scent; 3rd allows copying a specific individual)
Illusory Object (O1 Ill): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (O5 Ill): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Inspire Competence (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Inspire Courage (OC1 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Inspire Defense (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, plus resistance of half the spell level to physical damage, for 1 rd
Inspire Heroics (O4 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the effects of a subsequent Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense to +2, or +3 on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Invisibility (O2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Invisibility Sphere (O3 Ill): (2) 10' emanation makes creatures within invisible for 10 min or until any affected performs a hostile act (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Item Facade (O1 Ill): (2) Makes the target object up to a 10' cube appear decrepit or perfect for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 24 hr; 3rd effects are permanent)
Jealous Hex (O1 Foc Nec): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on the target's highest ability modifier, until the target saves or for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Ki Blast (O3 Foc Evo): (1) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP force and a 5' push (2 or 3 actions inflicts 3d6 HP in a 30' cone or 4d6 HP in a 60' cone) (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and a 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP for 1 action or +2d6 HP for 2 or 3)
Ki Rush (O1 Foc Tra): (1) Allows self to move twice and become concealed until the next turn
Ki Strike (O1 Foc Tra): (1) An unarmed Strike or Flurry Of Blows gains +1 attack and +1d6 HP force, lawful, negative, or positive (heightened +4 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Knock (O2 Tra): (2) R30' Gives +4 Athletics or Thievery on attempts to open the target object for 1 min; untrained attempts by self gain an additional +12
Know Direction (OC1 Div): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Levitate (O3 Evo): (2) Allows self to use concentrate actions to move the touched object or willing creature up or down 10' for 5 min
Light (OC1 Evo): (2) Touched object lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc Enc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Locate (O3 Div): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Lock (O1 Abj): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 30 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Loremaster's Etude (O1 Foc Div): (F) R30' Target may take the better of 2 rolls on the triggering Recall Knowledge check
Mage Armor (O1 Abj): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Mage Hand (OC1 Evo): (2) R30' Moves a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd moves a Bulk 1 object; 5th R60'; 7th moves a Bulk 2 object)
Magic Aura (O1 Ill): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 3rd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Magic Missile (O1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 missiles) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Magic Mouth (O2 Ill): (2) The image of a mouth appears on the touched creature or object and speaks a specified message up to 25 words the next time a specified trigger occurs within 30'
Magic Weapon (O1 Tra): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min
Magnificent Mansion (O7 Con): (1 min) R30' Creates an entrance to a 40'x40'x30' demiplane that can be entered only by those specified, is staffed by servants, and contains provisions for up to 150 people
Mariner's Curse (O5 Nec): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Mask Of Terror (O7 Ill): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Maze (O8 Con): (2) R30' Transports the target to an extradimensional maze while sustained or until it gains 2 solution steps; success on a Survival or Perception check gives 1 step, critical success gives 2 steps, and critical failure negates any previous successes
Mending (O1 Tra): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell level to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (OC1 Ill): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Mind Blank (O8 Abj): (2) R30' Target gains +4 saves vs. mental effects and automatic counteract attempts at the spell level + 1 vs. detection, revelation, and scrying until next daily prep
Mind Probe (O5 Div): (1 min) R30' Self gains answers from the target, requiring a DC 30 Deception check to refuse to answer each, with critical success giving a believable false answer (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Mind Reading (O3 Div): (2) R30' Reveals the surface thoughts of the target and whether its intelligence is higher, lower, or equal (save Will reveals relative intelligence only; critical success allows the target to read self's surface thoughts instead; critical failure allows sustaining for up to 1 min with no further save attempts)
Mindlink (O1 Div): (2) Telepathically transmits 10 min of information from self to touched
Mirror Image (O2 Ill): (2) Creates 3 duplicates that have an equal chance of misdirecting attacks on self for 1 min; any hit on a duplicate destroys it, and a critical success also hits self with a normal success
Misdirection (O2 Ill): (1 min) R30' Changes the magical aura of a target to mimic another until next daily prep
Mislead (O6 Ill): (2) Turns self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful Deception vs. Perception can make it appear that a self action originated with the duplicate
Modify Memory (O4 Div): (2) R30' Changes 1 rd of the target's memory each rd while sustained for up to 5 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt) (heightened 6th erases all memory of a specified topic from a willing target)
Nightmare (O4 Ill): (10 min) Causes a familiar target to have nightmares and awaken fatigued (save Will inflicts nightmares only; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts drained 2 until no longer fatigued)
Nondetection (O3 Abj): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Outcast's Curse (O4 Enc): (2) Touched suffers 1 step worse initial attitudes and the worse of 2 Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until the curse is removed (save Will effects last for 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes 2 steps worse)
Overwhelming Presence (O9 Enc): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for 6 turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Paralyze (O3 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd; subsequent successful saves shorten the effects by 1 rd, and a critical success ends them) (heightened 7th affects 10 targets)
Paranoia (O2 Ill): (2) R30' Target becomes unfriendly to all others for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure causes target to treat all others as enemies) (heightened 6th effects 5 targets)
Phantasmal Calamity (O6 Ill): (2) R500' 30' burst inflicts 11d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1 and trapped (save Reflex negates) until a subsequent Will save each rd succeeds) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Phantasmal Killer (O4 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 8d6 HP mental and frightened 2 (save Will inflicts 4d6 HP mental and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed Fortitude save or 12d6 HP mental, fleeing for 1 rd, and frightened 1 on success) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP, or +3d6 HP on a critical failure)
Phantom Pain (O1 Ill): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d4 HP mental, 1d4 HP persistent mental, and sickened 1 for 1 min or until no longer sickened (save Will inflicts initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1d4 HP persistent)
Phantom Steed (O2 Con): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 20, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 4th mount has 60' Speed and can move normally over water and natural difficult terrain; 5th mount can also Air Walk for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Plane Shift (O7 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Possession (O7 Nec): (2) R30' Self inhabits and controls the target's body for 1 min (save Will self inhabits but cannot control; critical success negates; critical failure gives control without further saves); a success on subsequent Will saves each turn negates control for 1 rd, and a critical success ends the spell (heightened 9th effects last for 10 min, and self body merges into possessed body)
Prestidigitation (OC1 Evo): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Prismatic Sphere (O9 Abj): (2) R10' 20' bright light in a 10' burst inflicts blindness for 1 rd (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts blindness for 1 min) and these effects on creatures passing through for 1 hr: 20 HP fire (save basic Reflex); 25 HP acid (save basic Reflex); 30 HP electricity (save basic Reflex); 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled); Flesh To Stone effects (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates); Warp Mind effects (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates); slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Prismatic Spray (O7 Evo): (2) 30' cone randomly inflicts an effect on each creature affected: (1) 50 HP fire (save Reflex negates); (2) 60 HP acid (save Reflex negates); (3) 70 HP electricity (save Reflex negates); (4) 30 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude negates); (5) Flesh To Stone effects (save Fortitude negates); (6) Warp Mind effects (save Will negates); (7) slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects); (8) 2 of the preceding effects
Prismatic Wall (O8 Abj): (3) R120' 20' bright light emitted by a 60'x30' wall inflicts blindness for 1 rd (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts blindness for 1 min) and these effects on creatures passing through for 1 hr: 20 HP fire (save basic Reflex); 25 HP acid (save basic Reflex); 30 HP electricity (save basic Reflex); 10 HP poison and enfeebled 1 for 1 min (save basic Fortitude also negates enfeebled); Flesh To Stone effects (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates); Warp Mind effects (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates); slowed 1 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts Plane Shift effects)
Private Sanctum (O4 Abj): (10 min) 100' burst around touched location blocks sensory information, scrying, and mind-reading until next daily prep
Project Image (O7 Ill): (2) R30' Creates an illusory copy of self, with the same Armor Class and saves, that can be used as a source of spells while sustained for up to 1 min or until damaged (heightened +2 extends maximum sustain to 10 min)
Protection (O1 Abj): (2) Touched gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. creatures of a specified alignment, and +3 vs. summoned creatures and control effects, for 1 min
Prying Eye (O5 Div): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Quivering Palm (O8 Foc Nec): (2) A successful Strike allows self to inflict stunned 3 and 80 HP on the target at any time within 1 month (save Fortitude inflicts stunned 1 and 40 HP and ends the spell; critical success ends the spell; critical failure kills the target) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP, or +5 HP on a successful save)
Ray Of Enfeeblement (O1 Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3; critical success on attack worsens save by 1 degree)
Read Aura (OC1 Div): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and the related school of magic (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Read Omens (O4 Div): (10 min) Reveals a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Remake (O10 Con): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Remove Curse (O4 Nec): (10 min) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 curse affecting touched
Remove Fear (O2 Enc): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fear effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Remove Paralysis (O2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a paralysis effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Repulsion (O6 Abj): (2) Emanation up to 40' prevents creatures from approaching for 1 min (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resilient Sphere (O4 Abj): (2) R30' Creates around the target an impassible force field with immunity to critical hits and precision damage, Armor Class 5, Harness 10, and 40 HP for 1 min or until destroyed (save Reflex decreases the HP to 10; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (O2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Resplendent Mansion (O9 Con): (1 min) R500' Creates a 300'x300' mansion, with entrances protected by Alarm effects and containing provisions for up to 150 people, until next daily prep
Restoration (O2 Nec): (1 min) Gives a 2-step reduction to a clumsy, enfeebled, or stupefied condition, a 1-step reduction to 2 of these conditions, or a 1-stage reduction to a toxin affecting touched (heightened 4th allows reducing a drained condition, lessening a toxin by 2 stages, or reducing a non-permanent doomed condition by 1; 6th allows reducing a permanent doomed condition by 1)
Restore Senses (O2 Nec): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blindness or deafness effect affecting touched (heightened 6th R30' affects 10 targets)
Retrocognition (O7 Div): (1 min) Reveals impressions of 1 day of past events at the current location per 1 min of concentration; traumatic events require a Will save to maintain the spell (heightened 8th gives impressions of 1 year per min; 9th gives impressions of 1 century per min)
Reverse Gravity (O7 Evo): (3) R120' Objects in a 20'x40' cylinder fall upward for 1 min
Rope Trick (O4 Con): (10 min) Touched rope leads to an extradimensional space that can hold 8 Medium creatures for 8 hr
Sanctuary (O1 Abj): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends the spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Scintillating Pattern (O8 Ill): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts confused for 1d4 rd and dazzled in a 40' radius while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1d4 rd, then confused for the remaining duration)
Scrying (O6 Div): (10 min) Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see the target creature while sustained for up to 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to glimpse self; critical failure allows the sensor to follow the target; scrying an unfamiliar target lowers the save DC by 2, and scrying an unknown target lowers it by 10)
Secret Page (O3 Ill): (1 min) Makes the text on a touched page appear as different text unless a specified password is spoken
See Invisibility (O2 Div): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Sending (O5 Div): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature
Shadow Blast (O5 Evo): (2) 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 5d8 HP of a choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Shadow Siphon (O5 Ill): (R) R60' Makes a counteract attempt on a damaging trigger spell at +2 the spell level, reducing the damage by half if successful
Shadow Walk (O5 Con): (1 min) Allows self and 9 willing touched to travel through the Shadow Plane at 20x Speed for 8 hr
Shatter (O2 Evo): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shield (OC1 Abj): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class for 1 rd; may end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened 3rd gives Hardness 10; 5th gives Hardness 15; 7th gives Hardness 20; 9th gives Hardness 25)
Sigil (OC1 Tra): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Silence (O2 Ill): (2) Willing touched makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around touched)
Sleep (O1 Enc): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts unconsciousness for 1 min or until a successful Perception check (save Will inflicts -1 Perception for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts unconsciousness for 1 hr or until a successful Perception check) (heightened 4th inflicts unconsciousness for 1 rd, or 1 min on a critical failure, followed by normal sleep; targets release held objects and do not wake from a successful Perception check)
Slow (O3 Tra): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Soothe (O1 Enc): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Soothing Ballad (O7 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Self and 9 allies gain a counteract attempt on all fear effects, a counteract attempt on all paralysis effects, or 7d8 HP restored (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP)
Sound Burst (O2 Evo): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic and deafened for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, deafened for 1 min, and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Spectral Hand (O2 Nec): (2) R120' Creates a crawling, spectral hand that delivers touch spells for 1 min; damage to the hand ends the spell and inflicts 1d6 HP to self
Spell Immunity (O4 Abj): (2) Gives touched an automatic counteract attempt vs. a specified spell until next daily prep
Spellwrack (O6 Abj): (2) R30' Until the curse is removed, each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of every spell affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (O6 Nec): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP force (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (O1 Nec): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from a willing target to self for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spirit Song (O8 Nec): (2) 60' cone inflicts 18d6 HP force on spirits, including any hidden in solid barriers (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spiritual Epidemic (O8 Nec): (2) R120' Inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 min and enfeebled 1 and stupefied 1 permanently; also affects creatures who later cast divine or occult spells on the target (save Will inflicts enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 and stupefied 3 for 1 min and enfeebled 2 and stupefied 2 permanently)
Spiritual Weapon (O2 Evo): (2) R120' Spectral weapon makes a +20 attack that inflicts 1d8 HP force or weapon damage type each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Status (O2 Div): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Subconscious Suggestion (O5 Enc): (2) R30' Specified trigger prompts the target to follow a reasonable, 1 min suggestion until next daily prep (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure inflicts following the suggestion for 1 hr) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Suggestion (O4 Enc): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion for 1 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects last for 1 hr) (heightened 8th targets 10 creatures)
Summon Entity (O5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 aberration appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Fey (O1 Con): (3) R30' A level -1 fey appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Synaptic Pulse (O5 Enc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts stunned 2 (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd)
Synesthesia (O5 Div): (2) R30' Inflicts a DC 5 flat check for concentration, clumsy 3, -10 Speed, and concealment of all objects and creatures for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 2) (heightened 9th affects 5 targets)
Talking Corpse (O4 Nec): (10 min) Touched corpse truthfully answers 3 questions within 10 min (save Will allows lying or refusing to answer; critical success prevents self from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on Deception checks when giving misleading answers)
Telekinetic Haul (O5 Evo): (2) R120' Moves an 80 Bulk, 20' cubic object 20' each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Telekinetic Maneuver (O2 Evo): (2) R60' Spell attack attempts to Disarm, Shove, or Trip
Telekinetic Projectile (OC1 Evo): (2) Spell attack hurls a loose object that inflicts 1d6+4 HP of the appropriate damage type, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Telepathic Bond (O5 Div): (1 min) Self and 4 willing touched can communicate telepathically for 8 hr
Telepathic Demand (O9 Enc): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with an existing telepathic target, sending a Suggestion as part of the message (save Will gives immunity for 1 day; critical success gives immunity for 1 month)
Telepathy (O4 Div): (2) Allows self to communicate telepathically with any creature in a 30' radius for 10 min (heightened 6th allows communication with creatures without a shared language)
Teleport (O6 Con): (10 min) Transports self and 4 willing touched creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 10th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Tentacular Limbs (O1 Foc Tra): (1) Extends reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10' for 1 min; adding an action to touch spells extends reach to 20' (heightened +2 adding an action gives +10' touch spell reach)
Time Stop (O10 Tra): (3) Allows self to perform 3 rd of actions that don't affect others until the spell ends
Tongues (O5 Div): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Touch Of Idiocy (O2 Enc): (2) Touch inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 4)
Triple Time (OC2 Foc Enc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +10' Speed for 1 rd
True Seeing (O6 Div): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
True Strike (O1 Div): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
True Target (O7 Div): (1) R60' Allies' attacks within 1 rd on a designated creature use the better of 2 attack rolls and ignore circumstance penalties and concealed and hidden conditions
Uncontrollable Dance (O8 Enc): (2) Touched suffers flat-footed and no reactions for 1 min and spends 2 actions each turn dancing (save Will effects last for 3 rd and the target spends 1 action each turn dancing; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min and the target spends all actions each turn dancing)
Undetectable Alignment (O2 Abj): (1 min) Touched appears neutral to alignment detection until next daily prep
Unfathomable Song (O9 Enc): (2) R120' Randomly inflicts frightened 2, confused for 1 rd, stupefied 4 for 1 rd, or blinded for 1 rd on 5 targets while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure replaces frightened 2 with stunned for 1 rd and stupefied 1)
Unrelenting Observation (O8 Div): (2) R100' 5 targets in a 20' burst can see a 6th target for 1 hr; lead and running water block the vision (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates)
Unseen Servant (O1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Unusual Anatomy (O5 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains darkvision and resistance 10 to precision and critical damage and inflicts 2d6 HP acid on successful non-reach melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistances and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Vampiric Exsanguination (O6 Nec): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP negative, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Touch (O3 Nec): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP negative, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Veil (O4 Ill): (2) R30' Makes 10 creatures appear as different, similar creatures for 1 hr (heightened 5th also disguises voices and scents; 7th targets can appear to be familiar individuals)
Ventriloquism (O1 Ill): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Pattern (O6 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles and blinds creatures while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful save each rd after leaving the area removes the blindness (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure blinds for 1 min with no further saves)
Visions Of Danger (O7 Ill): (3) R500' 30' burst inflicts 8d8 HP mental for 1 min (save basic Will; critical success allows an attempt to disbelieve that negates the effects) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Wail Of The Banshee (O9 Nec): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP negative and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Wall Of Force (O6 Evo): (3) R30' Creates an invisible 50'x20' wall with Armor Class 10, Harness 30, and 60 HP that blocks physical effects and corporeal, incorporeal, and ethereal creatures for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +20 HP)
Wanderer's Guide (O3 Div): (1 min) Reveals a route to a specified destination and reduces the movement penalty from difficult terrain while following it by half until next daily prep
Warp Mind (O7 Enc): (2) R120' Inflicts confused for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent confusion)
Weird (O9 Ill): (2) R120' Inflicts 16d6 HP mental and frightened 2 on all targets within range (save Will inflicts half HP and frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts death on a failed subsequent Fortitude save or double HP, frightened 2 and fleeing on success; critical success negates fleeing)
Wholeness Of Body (O2 Foc Nec): (1) Self regains 8 HP or attempts to counteract 1 poison or disease (heightened +1 restores +8 HP)
Wild Winds Stance (O4 Foc Evo): (1) Stance gives +2 Armor Class vs. ranged attacks and allows wind crash attacks
Wind Jump (O5 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains a 25' fly Speed, ending each turn on the ground, for 1 min (heightened 6th allows attempting a DC 30 Acrobatics check to avoid falling at the end of a turn)
You're Mine (O5 Foc Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts stunned 1 for 1 rd and allows self to direct 1 target action (save Will inflicts stunned only; critical success negates; critical failure gives control for 1 rd) (heightened 7th gives control for 1 rd; critical failure gives control for 1 min or until the target succeeds on a save at the end of each turn)
Zealous Conviction (O6 Enc): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Zone Of Truth (O3 Enc): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Inspire Courage occult spells/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Loremaster's Etude: Knows the Loremaster's Etude occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Occult Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Polymath: Knows the Unseen Servant occult spell
Triple Time: Knows the Triple Time occult cantrip
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a second tradition
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
